>>44316476

“I would like goggles that grant me a deeper understanding of all I see.”

> [[ The prophetics of the ancient world spoke only truths. ]]
> [[ They saw not what lies beyond, but what lies beyond the beyond. ]]
> [[ From this, they could speak with certainty—but it is said that ignorance is bliss. ]]
> [[ If you understand this consequence in whole, offer up merely three of our artifacts. ]]

>>44316544

“I would like a totem that recruits spirits to my cause.”

> [[ Like a river beneath the great tree of life, the power of Soul once flowed within the land. ]]
> [[ This Artifact could wield many abilities at once, but its power alone would not master the progeny of Soul. ]]
> [[ Indeed; its user must master their foes by wit or force, and expand the Artifact's capacity for control with further gifts. ]]
> [[ If this is what you wish to become? Then return four of our gifts, and receive the power of Soul. ]]

“Very well. Thank you for your time, great ones. I shall return when I have had time to decide on what I truly desire.”

The rumbling ceases, and the light dies.
